full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SANGS RGYAS SUM CU SO LNGA'I SGRUB THABS KYI CHO GA LTUNG BA'I MUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B CES SANGS RGYAS SUM CU SO LNGA'I SGRUB THABS KYI CHO GA LTUNG BA'I MUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD BRTZON LDAN PA DKON MCHOG 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, GRUB CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE'I GSUNG LA GZHI BYAS, KHA 'GENGS 'OS CUNG ZAD RNAMS GZHAN NAS KYANG BSNAN TE, ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM RNAMS LA PHAN DU RE BAS, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAD? BRTZON LDAN PA DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG KUN DGA'O,, ,,DNGOS BRGYUD BLA MA YI DAM BSKAL BZANG GI ,RNAM 'DREN RGYAL BA STONG DANG BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD, ,SANGS RGYAS SO LNGA NYE SRAS BRGYAD LA SOGS, ,RGYAL BA SRAS BCAS THUGS BSKYED BDEN BA'I MTHUS, ,BDAG GIS DUS GSUM DGE BA CI BGYIS PA, MI MTHUN RGYEN GYIS @010A *, ,NAM YANG MI GZHOM ZHING, ,DUS GSUM RGYAL BA KUN GYIS BSNGAGS PA YI, ,'BRAS BZANG MTHA' DAG 'GRUB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,GA-YENG ZHING BSAM SBYOR DMAN PAS BGYIS RNAMS KYANG, ,PHUL BYUNG DGE BA'I DNGOS POR BSGYUR BYAS TE, ,DE YI MTHU LAS SNGON BSAGS SDIG LTUNG KUN, ,LHAG MED BYANG ZHING DAG BAR BYIN GYIS RLOBS, ,'DI SNANG 'GAG TSE NYE BA'I SRAS RNAMS KYIS, ,DBUGS DBYUNG BDE BA CAN DU 'KHRID PA DANG, ,DER NI 'OD DPAG MED PA'I ZHAL MTHONG STE, ,GSUNG GI BDUD RTZI'I DGA' STON MYONG BAR SHOG ,SKYE ZHING SKYE BAR BSHES GNYEN DAM PA YIS, ,'BRAL MED RJES BZUNG BKA' BZHIN SGRUB PA DANG, ,PHYI NANG NYER 'TSE'I RKYEN GYIS MI GA-YO BAR, ,SA LAM BGROD PA MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,CES PA 'DI NI DAD BRTZON BLO DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYAMS PA 'JIGS MED YAR 'PHEL GYIS BSKUL NGOR ^BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SNGAGS RAM PA DKON MCHOG KUN DGA' 'O,, ,,
